challenges: Create API to generate dynamic copay cards and PAP with dynamic PDF generation on the fly.
Ensure SOC 2 and HIPAA compliance and integration with Change Healthcare to retrieve redemptions.
Develop custom dashboard to allow sales and marketing teams to data in real time.
outcomes: Program expanded to support five drugs and was designed to easily scale, ensuring the API and application could handle future growth with minimal effort.

Handled thousands of redemptions monthly, enabling real-time tracking of redemption data. This empowered the sales and marketing teams with actionable insights, improving workflow efficiency and decision-making.

Effectively obfuscated sensitive data to maintain HIPAA and SOC 2 compliance, while still providing the sales and marketing teams with the necessary information to assess and track the program's success.
